altername_name: Zelda no Densetsu: Yume o Miru Shima DX
塞尔达传说 梦见岛DX
name: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening DX
overview: Link’s latest challenge is set on the mysterious Koholint Island, a place where dreams and reality collide. As a castaway, Link must find a way to escape from the island and return to his beloved homeland of Hyrule. This will not be an easy task. The island’s inhabitants have no knowledge of the outside world. One creature, a talking owl, may know the solution to Link’s dilemma. Link must first tackle eight dungeons full of treacherous monsters and tricky traps. His goal: find the eight Instruments of the Sirens and awaken the omnipotent Wind Fish which rules the island. * Experience the adventure in color! * Journey through a new dungeon (can only be accessed on the Game Boy Color system)! * Take pictures and print them using the Game Boy Printer (sold separately)! * Battery-backed memory saves up to three separate game files!
